content:
I am a university fresh graduate and I am looking for nodejs developer as my first job. Can you help me to look for the salary of a nodejs developer?
Begin!

To help you find the salary of a Node.js developer, I will use the `estimated_salary_for_jsearch` function. This function will provide an estimated salary range for Node.js developers in a specified location. Since you didn't specify a location, I will assume a general location like "United States" to get a broad estimate. 

Let's proceed with the function call.

name: estimated_salary_for_jsearch
content: {"error": "", "response": "{'status': 'OK', 'request_id': 'b9f9ffa5-0004-449e-b305-9cb3c1e3e224', 'parameters': {'job_title': 'node.js developer', 'location': 'united states', 'location_type': 'ANY', 'years_of_experience': None}, 'data': [{'location': 'United States', 'job_title': 'Node Js Developer', 'min_salary': 87048.91, 'max_salary': 141490.13, 'median_salary': 110462.95, 'salary_period': 'YEAR', 'salary_currency': 'USD', 'publisher_name': 'Glassdoor', 'publisher_link': 'https://www.glassdoor.com/Salaries/company-salaries.htm?suggestCount=0&suggestChosen=false&sc.keyword=Node%20Js%20Developer&locT=N&locId=1', 'confidence': 'CONFIDENT'}]}"}

目前，我们获取到了美国地区Node.js开发者的薪资估计。根据Glassdoor的数据，Node.js开发者的年薪范围大约在$87,048.91到$141,490.13之间，中位数年薪为$110,462.95。

如果你有特定的城市或地区想要查询，可以提供更详细的位置信息，我可以为你获取更精确的薪资估计。

现在，我将结束任务并提供最终答案。

function.arguments: {"return_type": "give_answer", "final_answer": "根据Glassdoor的数据，美国地区Node.js开发者的年薪范围大约在$87,048.91到$141,490.13之间，中位数年薪为$110,462.95。如果你有特定的城市或地区想要查询，可以提供更详细的位置信息，我可以为你获取更精确的薪资估计。"}
function.name: Finish
